c74object.name: fl.source~
c74object.digest: Captures audio from the host environment and outputs the most recent values as frames.
c74object.description: The size of captured frames is settable with the length parameter. The length of the internal buffer determines the maximum frame length. There is a minimum latency equivalent to the length of the captured frame. A longer delay can be optionally selected (subject to the frame and buffer length). Capture can optionally be interpolated (at greater CPU usage) for sub-sample accuracy.

entry.name: 1. /buffer_size [instantiation double]
entry.description: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 2. /length [int]
entry.description: Sets the length of output frames in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 3. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and output length.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds

entry.name: 4. /delay [double]
entry.description:
Sets the input delay in the units specified by the units parameter:
Note that a minimum delay (or latency) is applied of the output length.

entry.name: 5. /interp [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the interpolation mode:
none - no interpolation.
linear - linear interpolation.
hermite - cubic hermite interpolation.
bspline - cubic bspline interpolation.
lagrange - cubic lagrange interpolation.
[0] - none [1] - linear [2] - hermite [3] - bspline [4] - lagrange
